item.title: Concerning Projects
item.description: Over the next couple of days, I will be updating the projects page. The updates mainly consist of experiments and projects that I created during my studies.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome. I’m glad you found this place. On this blog, I want to share my thoughts on technology, music and a few other topics. I try to post in a regular manner. Come back any time to see the updates.
